IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO FOSTER APPRECIATION AND CONCERN FOR ALL LIVING THINGS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO FOSTER APPRECIATION AND CONCERN FOR ALL LIVING THINGS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE THE HIGHEST STANDARD OF CARE FOR OUR ANIMAL AND PLANT COLLECTION AND EXHIBIT THEM FOR THE OVER 1,000,000 VISITORS TO THE ZOO IN EACH FISCAL YEAR. UTILIZE ALL RESOURCES AT OUR DISPOSAL FOR THE CONSERVATION OF THE EARTH'S FLORA AND FAUNA. INCLUDED IN THE EXPERIENCE IS QUALITY FOOD AND NOVELTY CONCESSIONS FOR THE COMFORT OF ALL GUESTS.IN ADDITION, THE ZOO PROVIDES A DIVERSE AND HIGH-QUALITY RECREATIONAL EXPERIENCE FOR OVER 350,000 GUESTS ANNUALLY AT ITS EDUCATIONAL CENTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUND CONSISTS OF A FUND ESTABLISHED TO SUPPORT OPERATIONS AND EDUCATION. RJ COFFEY ANIMAL FUND: TO BE USED FOR THE PURCHASE AND REPLACEMENT OF ANIMALS, BIRDS, FISH AND REPTILES FOR THE SAN ANTONIO ZOO, THE CONSTRUCTION OF NEW IMPROVEMENTS AT SAID ZOO, AND FOR PURPOSES OF MAINTENANCE AT SAID ZOO. ZOO EDUCATION ENDOWMENT FUND: FUNDS WILL BE USED TO SUPPORT THE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT IN BRINGING DISADVANTAGED YOUTH AND FAMILIES TO VISIT THE ZOO, CONNECT WITH NATURE AND ENGAGE IN OUR MISSION. ZOO OPERATIONS ENDOWMENT FUND: FUNDS ARE TO BE USED TO PROVIDE OPERATIONAL SUPPORT FOR THE ZOO. HEB SCHOLARSHIP ENDOWMENT FOR WILL SMITH ZOO SCHOOL: THE PURPOSE OF THIS FUND IS TO PROVIDE TUITION SCHOLARSHIPS FOR THE SCHOOL.
THE ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHES THE COMPENSATION OF THE OFFICERS, WHICH INCLUDES A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: MORE THAN 35% OWNERSHIP OF GUIDO BROTHERS CONSTRUCTION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AMOUNTS IN PART I SCH M ARE PRESENTED USING A COMBINATION OF THE FOLLOWING TWO METHODS: NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS AND NUMBER OF ITEMS RECEIVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SEVERAL OF THE BOARD MEMBERS HAVE A FAMILY OR BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP. NONE OF THE EXECUTIVE BOARD MEMBERS HAVE ANY SUCH RELATIONSHIPS. * MARKO BARRETT AND MARY BARRETT - FAMILY RELATIONSHIP * COSMO GUIDO AND MARYANNE GUIDO - FAMILY AND BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP * JAYME RUSSELL AND KELLY A RUSSELL - FAMILY RELATIONSHIP * JIM SATEL AND GARY SIMMONS - BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FEDERAL TAX RETURN ON FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S INDEPENDENT PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM. IT IS THEN REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER BEFORE SIGNING AND FILING WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS DISTRIBUTED TO ALL EMPLOYEES ANNUALLY AND THEY ARE REQUIRED TO ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT AND AGREEMENT OF THE POLICY. BOARD MEMBERS AGREE TO THE POLICY UPON JOINING THE BOARD AND ARE ASKED TO UPDATE THE POLICY PERIODICALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION ESTABLISHES THE COMPENSATION OF THE OFFICERS, WHICH INCLUDES A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, WRITTEN EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT, AND APPROVAL BY THE BOARD OR COMPENSATION COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COPIES OF THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE ZOO'S EXECUTIVE OFFICES.
